text: {| |} MV Ever Queen of Asia is a passenger ferry owned and operated by Ever Shipping Lines. She's the former MV Shiraito up until December 1998 when she was sold to Ever. == References == == External links == * MV Ever Queen of Asia - Vessel Finder * MV Ever Queen of Asia Maritime Connector Category:1970 ships Category:Ships built in Japan Category:Ferries of the Philippines Category:Active ships of the Philippines
title: MV Ever Queen of Asia
